goals__remit:
Polo Interregionale Jean Monnet of Pavia, Jean Monnet Centre of Excellence 
Goals:  
Promotion of Interdisciplinary Studies on EU issues through: 
- Promotion of debates and diffusion on information on EU issues. 
- Organization of Events, Meetings, Courses. 
- Publication Activities: books, study series, newsletter.
